reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater well-made and perfect for winter, with a vibrant color and silky texture that's cozy without being oppressive.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautifully made
items.body: It’s a beautifully made quality sweater and I believe the sizes are accurate. I am used to wearing a small for every top but for this one it will look better in a medium, so I am returning the small and ordering a medium. The fabric is a little heavier, so not a thin sweater at all. It’s very classy looking to wear for business casual, as well as just wearing it with a pair of jeans. It’s very soft and lies comfortably when you are wearing it. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality and Perfect Fit!
items.body: I was pleasantly surprised by this purchase! The sweater fabric is soft, high-quality, and doesn’t pill. The color is vibrant, and the material isn’t see-through—no gaps or loose stitching. The fit is true to size; I ordered a medium and I’m 5'5" and 170 lbs. I’ll definitely be purchasing more colors! Read more
items.author: Leslie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great buy
items.body: Nice fabric, not too thin or bulky. Seems well made, looks more expensive than it was! Fits well except the sleeves are really long, but rolled up is cute. Read more
items.author: Leslie T

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty sweater.
items.body: Very nice quality. True to size. Nice medium weight, not thin or bulky, pretty style and gentle knit stretch for comfort. Hope to get another color or two. Washes well. I use a drying rack instead of using the dryer and it maintains its shape nicely. Read more
items.author: Greg

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice casual sweater
items.body: More than I expected. Nice soft material. Fits very well. Comfortable. Read more
items.author: JK.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Short wasted
items.body: This sweater would be a five star sweater except for the fact it is way too short wasted. If it weren’t for that concern, I would highly recommend. Washes upwelling and looks dressy except for the fact it is too short waisted. Read more
items.author: JLynn of California

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect winter sweater!
items.body: These sweaters are perfect for winter! The knit is substantial, but light enough that it sits well and does not feel bulky. The fabric has good stretch and retains it's shape well. I like it to so much that I bought it in two colors. These run big; I am 5'2" and 117 lbs and the XS is plenty roomy for me. I have worn them with and without a puffer vest over them. Read more
items.author: Eleanor

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Anyabess cable sweater size snall.
items.body: One of the nicest sweaters I have owned. Perfect fit,not too rough or stiff. Cream color as pictured. Good basic clothing, useful for years. Thank you Read more
items.author: Purchaser

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky, Tan, Brown, Taffy, Deep Green, Hot Pink, Black, Bright Tan, Navy Blue, Purple Taupe, Khaki, Pink, White, Deep Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
